content: LUAWMS (Lasbela University of Agriculture, Water and Marine Sciences) is a specialized public sector university in Uthal, Balochistan. It focuses on coastal development, agriculture, and modern sciences. The Chancellor is the Governor of Balochistan.
Students of Computer Science Department Hafiz Salahuddin,Rehmatullah Sajidi, Mairaj Ahmed and Muhammad Sajid. they are the studen of 6th semester, project created in supervision of Madam Madiha.
Admissions generally open once a year in **September/October** for the Spring session. Advertisements are published in leading newspapers (Dawn, Jang) and on the website www.luawms.edu.pk.
Admissions are granted on Open Merit (All Pakistan) and District Quota (Balochistan). Reserved seats exist for Sports, Disabled Persons, and Children of University Employees.
DVM is a flagship 5-year degree program at LUAWMS. Eligibility: F.Sc (Pre-Medical) with at least 50% marks. It focuses on animal health, livestock management, and surgery.
Offers B.Sc (Hons) in Agriculture with specializations in Agronomy, Horticulture, Entomology, Plant Pathology, and Soil Science. Duration: 4 Years. Eligibility: F.Sc (Pre-Medical/Pre-Engineering).

A unique 4-year program utilizing the coastal location of Lasbela. Studies include Oceanography, Marine Biology, and Coastal Management. Field trips to Dam and Sonmiani beaches are part of the curriculum.
Focuses on climate change, pollution control, and natural resource management. Eligibility: Intermediate in Science.
A 4-year program covering Programming, AI, Database Systems, and Web Engineering. The department has dedicated computer labs with internet access. Eligibility: 50% in F.Sc Pre-Eng/ICS.
A 4-year business degree focusing on Marketing, HRM, Finance, and Supply Chain. Eligibility: Intermediate (FA/FSc/I.Com) with 45% marks.
Focuses on English Literature, Linguistics, and Communication Skills. Graduates often pursue careers in teaching, media, and civil services.
Studies government systems, political behavior, and international politics. A popular choice for students aiming for CSS/PMS exams.
Focuses on global politics, diplomacy, and foreign policy. Career paths include Foreign Office, NGOs, and Media.
Covers Micro/Macro Economics, Econometrics, and Development Economics. Essential for careers in banking and policy making.
The study of society, social behavior, and community development. Fieldwork involves visiting local communities in Lasbela.
The Department of Education offers: 1. B.Ed (Hons) 4 Years (after Intermediate). 2. B.Ed 2.5 Years (after BA/BSc). 3. B.Ed 1.5 Years (after MA/MSc). Focuses on teacher training and pedagogy.
Covers Quran, Hadith, Fiqh, and Seerat-un-Nabi. Aimed at producing scholars with modern and religious knowledge.
DVM has a higher fee structure due to clinical training. Admission Fee: ~Rs. 10,000. Semester Fee: ~Rs. 25,000 to 30,000.

topic: Fee Structure BS Computer Science & IT
content: Semester Fee: Approx Rs. 20,000 - 25,000. Lab charges are included. Admission fee is paid once in the first semester.
The most affordable programs. B.Ed, BS English, Islamic Studies, etc., have semester fees ranging from Rs. 15,000 to 18,000.
Accommodation Fee: Rs. 5,000 per semester. Security Deposit (Refundable): Rs. 2,000. Mess charges are managed by the student committee on a monthly dividing basis.
A major scholarship for LUAWMS students. Eligibility: Local/Domicile of Balochistan, enrolled in a full-time degree, having good GPA (usually 3.0+). Covers tuition fees and stipend.
Federal Govt scholarship for low-income families (income < 45,000/month). Covers 100% tuition fee + Rs. 4,000 monthly stipend.
For financially deserving students. Application forms are available at the Financial Aid Office. Covers tuition fee.

topic: USAID Merit and Need Based Scholarship
content: Specifically often available for Agriculture and Business students. Covers full tuition, books, and boarding.
Financial assistance for poor and deserving students. Students must apply directly to PBM with university verification.
Awarded to the top 3 position holders in every class based on GPA in the previous semester. Fee concession is granted.
The university has a well-equipped central library with thousands of books, research journals, and an HEC Digital Library section with computer access.
University Point Buses cover: 1. Uthal City. 2. Winder. 3. Hub (limited). 4. Bela (limited). Transport fee is charged per semester.
Facilities for Cricket, Football, Volleyball, and Badminton are available. The university organizes an annual 'Sports Week'.
The campus has a Smart University WiFi network provided by HEC/PERN. Students can get login credentials from the IT center.
Responsible for student discipline, cards, clearance, and extracurricular activities. Located in the Admin Block.
Handles datesheets, result announcements, transcript issuance, and degree verification. The Controller of Examinations heads this department.
